   contain the root `toctree` directive.

===================================
EasyMCM
===================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:

   components/*
   variables/*
   tutorial
   example
   

EasyMCM is a UI Library for Morrowind, 
allowing modders to quickly generate Mod Config 
Menus for their MWSE mods without touching UI code.
